thread.title: South African's Jacob Zuma deploys troops to state address SONA
thread.title_full: South African's Jacob Zuma deploys troops to state address SONA

title: South African's Jacob Zuma deploys troops to state address SONA
text:
South African's Jacob Zuma deploys troops to state address SONA 8 February 2017 Close share panel Image copyright AP Image caption South African President Jacob Zuma will give his state of the union address on Thursday South Africa's President Jacob Zuma has ordered the deployment of about 440 troops to maintain law and order in parliament for his annual state of the nation address on Thursday. 
Opposition parties have condemned the decision as a "declaration of war". 
Previous addresses by Mr Zuma in parliament have been marred by protests and brawls as opposition MPs demanded his resignation. 
Mr Zuma has been dogged by corruption allegations for more than a decade.
